skills.name: Midnight Tumult
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Kafka's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Caressing Moonlight
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Kafka's ATK to a target enemy and Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color> of Kafka's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.\nIf the target enemy is currently receiving DoT, all DoTs currently placed on that enemy immediately produce DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of their original DMG.

skills.name: Twilight Trill
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Kafka's ATK to all enemies, with a <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> for enemies hit to become Shocked and immediately take DMG from their current Shock state, equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak></color> of its original DMG. Shock lasts for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).\nWhile Shocked, enemies receive Lightning DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color> of Kafka's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Gentle but Cruel
skills.desc: After an ally of Kafka's uses Basic ATK on an enemy target, Kafka immediately launches 1 <u>follow-up attack</u> and deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of her ATK to that target, with a <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> base chance to inflict Shock equivalent to that applied by her Ultimate to the attacked enemy target for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turns. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

skills.name: Mercy Is Not Forgiveness
skills.desc: Immediately attacks all enemies within a set range. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of Kafka's ATK to all enemies, with a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to inflict Shock equivalent to that applied by her Ultimate on every enemy target for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Da Capo
eidolons.desc: When the Talent triggers a follow-up attack, there is a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> base chance to increase the DoT received by the target by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Fortississimo
eidolons.desc: While Kafka is on the field, DoT dealt by all allies increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Capriccio
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Recitativo
eidolons.desc: When an enemy target takes DMG from the Shock status inflicted by Kafka, Kafka additionally regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

eidolons.name: Doloroso
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Leggiero
eidolons.desc: The Shock inflicted on the enemy target by the Ultimate, the Technique, or the Talent-triggered follow-up attack has a DMG multiplier increase of <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> and lasts <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s) longer.

skillTree.name: Torture
skillTree.desc: When the Ultimate is used, enemy targets will now receive DMG immediately from all currently applied DoT sources instead of just receiving DMG immediately from the currently applied Shock state.

skillTree.name: Plunder
skillTree.desc: If an enemy is defeated while Shocked, Kafka additionally regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

skillTree.name: Thorns
skillTree.desc: The base chance for Ultimate, Technique, or the follow-up attack triggered by the Talent to inflict Shock increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
